result.purpose: Handles various operations related to quests, events, users, rewards, and sponsors within the application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file is responsible for handling specific aspects of the application, promoting separation of concerns.

internal/handlers/default.go.purpose: Defines a health check handler for an application using Echo framework.

internal/handlers/errors.go.purpose: Defines error constants related to quest and participant operations.

internal/handlers/event.go.purpose: Handles event-related operations such as creating, deleting, and listing events.

internal/handlers/helpers.go.purpose: Provides error handling utilities for logging and wrapping errors.

internal/handlers/history.go.purpose: Handles creation of history records for actions performed by operators.

internal/handlers/quest.go.purpose: Handles quest-related operations and interactions within the application.

internal/handlers/quest_action.go.purpose: Handles quest-related actions and activities in the application.

internal/handlers/quest_helper.go.purpose: Handles quest-related operations and validations for the quest center service.

internal/handlers/quest_pool.go.purpose: Handles quest pool operations including upserting, deleting, and listing quest pools.

internal/handlers/quest_reward.go.purpose: Handles quest reward retrieval and management.

internal/handlers/reward.go.purpose: Handles reward-related operations for a quest system.

internal/handlers/shop.go.purpose: Defines the Shop interface and its methods for managing shop categories, tiers, items, and user inventory.

internal/handlers/sponsor.go.purpose: Handles sponsor-related operations such as upserting, listing, and deleting sponsors.

internal/handlers/user.go.purpose: Handles user-related operations, specifically finding users by their addresses.

internal/handlers/user_event.go.purpose: Handles user event-related operations such as verifying premium status and joining events.

internal/handlers/user_event_helper.go.purpose: Handles user event data and interactions with related services.

internal/handlers/user_quest.go.purpose: Handles user quest operations including taking quests and exporting audit results.

internal/handlers/user_quest_helper.go.purpose: Handles user quest-related functionalities including reward distribution and action verification.

internal/handlers/user_reward.go.purpose: Handles user reward operations including listing, rejecting, and distributing rewards.

internal/handlers/user_reward_helper.go.purpose: Handles user rewards for quests, including finding eligible rewards and distributing them.
